column4: I was wondering when you are in the terminal how can you get a list off all the software you can download
I'm not sure you'd ever WANT a list of ALL the software you can install. That would be an awfully long list :D Why do you ask?
Use Synaptic or apt-cache. You will like either of those frontends much better.
Well then, on behalf of us all, welcome to the Ubuntu community!!
